name: Arrow Puzzle
description:
Guide your characters to the goal by placing arrows on the floor

This is an early prototype to test the mechanics

Controls:

  • Left click: place/rotate arrows
  • Right click: remove arrows
  • Spacebar: play/stop
  • Ctrl+click (or middle click): make arrows thin

In this demo you can skip levels using the number keys (1-2-3-4-5-6-7-8-9-0). There are 10 levels.
